pages.page:
I.2. The SAS plans, implements, monitors
and coordinates programs and services
for students, faculty, staff and
administrators.
Minutes of the Meetings

Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Don Severino delas Alas Campus Indang, Cavite
OFFICE OF STUDENT AFFAIRS AND SERVICES
Proceedings – Meeting with OSAS Heads October 19, 2020 – 1pm to 3:30pm
A call to online meeting with OSAS Heads was made in order to revisit the Citizen’s Charter and harmonize the OSAS procedure, in compliance with ARTA requirement
Present in the online meeting:
FULL NAME DESIGNATION CAMPUS
Melona I. Saquin OSAS Coordinator TANZA CAMPUS LEONARD V. PAUNIL Coordinator, Admission and Testing CARMONA CAMPUS Services/Student Welfare
Sharon M. Isip Dean, OSAS MAIN CAMPUS April Golloso-Gile Instructor I GEN TRIAS CAMPUS KRISTINE JOY E. SIERRA RMESS COORDINATOR/IN-CHARGE MAIN CAMPUS PLACEMENT
RON ERIK C. FRONTUNA HEAD, OSAS CARMONA CAMPUS Noelle T. Legaspi Director, OSAS CCAT CCAT CAMPUS
LIILIAN O. SIDAMON OSAS COORDINATOR TRECE CAMPUS Marlyn OIC, Registrar’s Office CCAT CAMPUS
MARICAR M. LILANG Instructor/OSAS Coordinator SILANG CAMPUS STEFFANIE MAGLASANG-BATO Head, OSAS BACOOR CAMPUS Maria Sheryl Binamira Admin. Aide III CCAT CAMPUS
Laarni B. Perlado OSAS Coordinator CAVITE CITY CAMPUS Maria Angela L. Diopol Guidance Coordinator IMUS CAMPUS
GILIAN JOAN M. HERNANDEZ GUIDANCE COUNSELOR III MAIN CAMPUS PAUL NORMAN D. FERMA ISPS HEAD/NSTP MAIN CAMPUS

Proceedings:
1. Omission of “re-assessment” in the last step of Application/Renewal Procedure for
Scholarship as per Carmona Campus – no need to reassess
2. Omission of “scholar” as to all scholars are applicants 3. As per admission for application procedure, omission of the name of Campus
under the heading part, and instead the name of campus would be ticked 4. Campuses provided their links for the downloadable forms for admission
5. Skipped the Procedure for Teacher-Certificate Program (TCP) for further
clarification 6. As for CCAT Campus, they were given leeway to create their own Citizen’s
Charter, for reason that some procedures might not be applicable to them. They are also advised to submit their Citizen’s Charter to ARTA for approval
7. As for counseling procedure, inclusion of Informed Consent form
8. Creation of procedure for Follow-up service (Guidance service) 9. Creation of procedure for student grievance and misdemeanor
10. During presentation of Student Development Services procedures, campuses raised concerns about insurance and accreditation of student organizations
11. Campuses raised that they don’t have CPA – No auditor 12. Discussion of using resolutions in every student organization’s move (resolution to
withdraw)
Photos taken during online meeting:
Letters/Memos

Republic of the Philippines CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Don Severino delas Alas Campus Indang, Cavite
OFFICE OF STUDENT AFFAIRS AND SERVICES
June 7, 2021
PROF. GIL D. RAMOS Campus Administrator, Tanza Campus This University
Dear Sir Ramos,
The Office of Student Affairs and Services of the main and satellite campuses are tasked by the Office of the President and the Office of the Vice President for Academic Affairs to prepare a Learning Continuity Plan. This is based from CMO No. 8 s. 2021 (Guidelines on the Implementation of Flexible Delivery of Student Affairs and Services (SAS) Programs During the COVID-19).
In this light, we would like to invite your OSAS Director/ Head for a meeting on Thursday, June 10, 2021, 9am to 12 noon via Cisco Webex. Below are the meeting credentials:
Event Number: 184 617 9373 Event Password: osas2021
Also, we will be sending a draft copy of the said continuity plan for comments and suggestions.
Thank you very much po for your continued support.
Very respectfully yours,
SHARON M. ISIP, RPm
Recommending Approval:
MA. AGNES P. NUESTRO, PhD Vice- President for Academic Affairs
Accomplishment Report

Republic of the Philippines CvSU Mission CAVITE STATE UNIVERSITY Tanza Campus Cavite State University shall provide excellent, equitable and relevant Phase 2 Pabahay 2000 Bagtas Tanza Cavite educational opportunities in the arts,  (046) 414-3979 sciences and technology through quality www.cvsu.edu.ph instruction and responsive research and developmental activities. OFFICE OF STUDENT AFFAIRS AND SERVICES It shall produce professional, skilled and morally upright individuals for global July 20, 2021 competitiveness.
PROF. GIL D. RAMOS Campus Administrator This Campus
Dear Sir,
Good day!
Respectfully submitting the accomplishment report of the Office of Student Affairs and Services for the First and Second Semester S.Y 2020-2021.
Thank you!
Respectfully your,
MELONA I. SAQUIN Coordinator, OSAS
Approved:
GIL D. RAMOS Campus Administrator
